name: Azure Storage
natural_language_description: 这是 Azure Storage 节点。主要用于: Interact with Azure Storage API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: sharedKey

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: container

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get (值: get) - Retrieve data for a specific container
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve a list of containers

container.name: container
container.natural_language_description: 参数名: Container | 作用: Select the container to get | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

blobCreate.name: blobCreate
blobCreate.description: The name of the new or existing blob
blobCreate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blob Name | 作用: The name of the new or existing blob | (必填项)

from.name: from
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 默认值: binary | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary Contents | 作用: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: URL where to read of the blob contents from
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL where to read of the blob contents from | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - The fields to add to the output
filter (值: None) - Filters the results to return only containers with a name that begins with the specified prefix

blob.name: blob
blob.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blob | 作用: Blob to get | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

containerCreate.name: containerCreate
containerCreate.description: The name of the new container
containerCreate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Container Name | 作用: The name of the new container | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
